name: Technfest
description:
Transform Messages into Delighted Customers!

Leverage the power of the WhatsApp Business API to automate and enhance your customer support, sales, and marketing efforts. Technfest IT Solution offers a suite of advanced features to streamline your communications and boost efficiency.

Key Features:

Automated Responses: Ensure timely replies with automated messaging.
Broadcast Messaging: Easily send updates and announcements to multiple recipients.
